So for today's video we are at a place called
Sulbing (설빙) and this is a popular chain

in Korea that specializes in frozen desserts
(디저트).

We're going to be trying something that is
quite similar to Patbingsu (팥빙수) and

Patbingsoo (팥빙수) is a shaved ice dessert
with red beans.

But we're having Sulbing (설빙) which is
actually frozen milk that has been shaved

into these little snowflakes so you get a
much creamier dessert (디저트).

And we've ordered two different varieties
so those are coming up.

your quintessential Korean summer dessert.
